DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Plastic Stencils
DescriptionData.Description:
Eight panels are in this handy pack of Graftobian stencils. These stencils are perfect for face painting cheek designs. The designs include stars, butterflies, flowers and rainbows.
Laser cut plastic for precise designs, Graftobian face painting stencils are made of flexible plastic so they curve to the skin. Just press them close to the face or hand or whatever you are painting. They are also easy to clean-just rinse off and reuse.
Each panel of the Graftobian stencil is slightly smaller than a 3x5 card.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Graftobian face paint stencils clean easily with a baby wipe or wet washcloth Store face paint stencils flat for best long term results If cared for properly, Graftobian stencils can be quite durable
Eight panels are included in each pack
The stencils are laser cut plastic so that they have clean edges and make precise designs
Graftobian stencils are very flexible and bend to flatten down on skin Just press the stencil down, and press through the opening with a wet, painted loaded sponge Lift and you have a design!
Each panel of the Graftobian stencil is slightly smaller than a 3x5 card
